title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE JOINT MUNICIPAL PEACE AND ORDER COUNCIL AND MUNICIPAL ANTI-DRUG ABUSE COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. 2025-08 DATED AUGUST 14, 2025 ENTITLED “RESOLUTION DESIGNATING MR. ANATOLY M. GUINTO, EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT V / GHIEF OF STAFF, AS THE NEW SPECIAL DISBURSING OFFICER (SDO) OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS. Councilor Bénedicté S. Alborida
